block.p: Jennifer Elise Abcug, the daughter of Lynne and Leslie Abcug of Parsippany, N.J., was married last evening to Mitchell Gary Brody, the son of Herbert Brody of Middletown, N.J., and the late Diana Brody. Rabbi Henry Wiener officiated at the Roosevelt Hotel in New York.

Mrs. Brody, 29, is a social worker at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York. She graduated from Brandeis University and received a master's degree in social work from New York University.

Jennifer Elise Abcug, the daughter of Lynne and Leslie Abcug of Parsippany, N.J., was married last evening to Mitchell Gary Brody, the son of Herbert Brody of Middletown, N.J., and the late Diana Brody. Rabbi Henry Wiener officiated at the Roosevelt Hotel in New York.

Mrs. Brody, 29, is a social worker at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York. She graduated from Brandeis University and received a master's degree in social work from New York University.

Mr. Brody, 30, is a computer programmer in the research and development group of Bloomberg L.P., the financial information services company in New York. He graduated from the University of Connecticut.
